usedBy.description:
Includes every component, transition, and typography including their
media queries if the `$md-media-included` variable is `true`. You can
modify any global variables before including this mixin to change the overall
theme.

context.name: react-md-everything

context.name: md-box-shadow

parameter.name: elevation
parameter.description: The material design elevation. This should be a number from 0 - 5.

usedBy.description:
Includes the styles for material design buttons. Each button type can optionally
be excluded. However, if the `floating` styles are included, the `icon` styles
will also be included.

context.name: react-md-buttons

usedBy.description:
Includes the styles for chips. The remove, avatar, and contact styles can be excluded.
If the `$include-contact` param is true, the avatar styles will always be included even
if `$include-avatar` is false.

context.name: react-md-chips

usedBy.description: Creates the styles for edit dialogs in a data table.

context.name: react-md-data-table-edit-dialogs

usedBy.description:
Includes the base styles for pickers. This is styles that is used for both date and time pickers.
This is normally used within the `react-md-pickers` mixin.

context.name: react-md-pickers-base

usedBy.description:
Includes the styles for the Selection Controls' switch only. The `$secondary-color` will
automatically be switched to the `-500` swatch in light themes and the `-200` swatch
in dark themes.

context.name: react-md-selection-controls-switch
